resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Keep the camera as stable as possible. Avoid unwanted text around the grid.
Choose the floor size. The number of rows and columns should be 2 to 4.
Print the N x M unique choice lables on separate papers with big enough font to be seen by your camera.
The teacher must create a file containing the questions, each on a single line.\n The number of options on all lines myst be equal to the number of tiles on the grid.\n
The file must follow the following format

Click the New Game button in the application\'s main screen to start the calibration mode.\n Click on all text that is part of the grid, make sure the text turns green. \n When you're done, click Start Game.

Expand the drop down menu (the 3 dots) at the top of the screen. Click Start to start the game server.
 You will see a link to the game server. Open the link on your computer.
 Upload the questions and start the game.

 Avoid unnecessary text around the grid, during calibration and during the game. Do not change the phone's orientation while scanning.
